channel.title: Comments on: Elrond as Afterlife Theorist

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: @Cindy, Huh? Not enough fun elements because it sticks to the Tolkien Universe? That makes no sense. Every MMO has to stick to some idea of a Universe and what fits and what doesn't. Just because the game sticks to the Tolkien Universe doesn't mean that Turbine can't extend the story in any way. Large parts of the current Epic quest line have nothing to do with the main storyline in the Lord of the Rings books and are focused more on the background story that was present in Lord of the Rings. Remember, this is (at least the initial story) about the Shadows of Angmar so it's more about the Witch King rather than directly about Sauron in Mordor.
item.content:encoded: @Cindy, Huh? Not enough fun elements because it sticks to the Tolkien Universe? That makes no sense. Every MMO has to stick to some idea of a Universe and what fits and what doesn’t. Just because the game sticks to the Tolkien Universe doesn’t mean that Turbine can’t extend the story in any way. Large parts of the current Epic quest line have nothing to do with the main storyline in the Lord of the Rings books and are focused more on the background story that was present in Lord of the Rings. Remember, this is (at least the initial story) about the Shadows of Angmar so it’s more about the Witch King rather than directly about Sauron in Mordor.

item.title: By: Cindy
item.dc:creator: Cindy
item.description: The desire to stick to the Tolkien World will be the death of this game. There are just not enough fun elements.
item.content:encoded: The desire to stick to the Tolkien World will be the death of this game. There are just not enough fun elements.

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: As long as Tom Cruise doesn't lock himself in Elrond's closet, I think LOTRO will be okay.
item.content:encoded: As long as Tom Cruise doesn’t lock himself in Elrond’s closet, I think LOTRO will be okay.

item.content:encoded: Think you could get an audio sample of that?

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: This is all well and good but is the game actually worth playing?
item.content:encoded: This is all well and good but is the game actually worth playing?

item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description: Ok, that was darn funny.....oh, so very very wrong, but funny as heck.
item.content:encoded: Ok, that was darn funny…..oh, so very very wrong, but funny as heck.
